entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Rock Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.0°C
entry.summary:

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain at times mixed with snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 4 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain near noon. Snow level near valley bottom. Snowfall amount 5 cm. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
